sentences.sContent: Come over to the fire and cozy up a bit.
sentences.sContent_eng: Come over to the fire and cozy up a bit.
sentences.sCn: 到火炉这边来会感到舒适一点。

sentences.sContent: “It is extremely expensive, but at least I have a cozy bed, ” he said.
sentences.sContent_eng: “It is extremely expensive, but at least I have a cozy bed, ” he said.
sentences.sCn: 他说：“这房子真是太贵了，但至少我有一张舒适的床了。”
